summaryPageInfoSummaryTitle: Summary of the information used to predict your sick leave duration

landingPageTesting.title: Thank you for wanting to test our web application

landingPage.title: Prediction of sick leave duration
landingPage.description: In order to provide you with appropriate support during your sick leave, we will make a prediction of its duration based on your data. This is helpful in planning for support measures such as follow-up meetings and economical support for a longer period of time.

dataPointsSummary.title: Data that is used in the prediction
dataPointsSummary.description1: Below is all the information about you that will be used in predicting your sick leave duration. This information is gathered from the national population register and our registers.
dataPointsSummary.description2: Click on the "?" beside each piece of information to see why it is used.

usingAiPage.title: Using Artificial Intelligence for prediction

aboutAiInfo.description: In order to provide you with the most appropriate support given your situation, we offer the use of an artificial intelligence (AI) model to aid the case handler in predicting the duration of your sick leave. You can read more about what this entails and how the model works by expanding this box. Whether you wish to use the AI model for prediction is completely up to you.

whatAi.title: What agreeing to the use entails
whatAi.description1: The support you will receive is determined by a case handler, and one of the factors in this decision is the prediction of your sick leave duration.
whatAi.description2: The AI model is an aid the case handler can use in this prediction, but only if you agree to its use.

learnMore.title: What agreeing to use the AI model entails
learnMore.description: You are free to choose whether you would like to have the AI model used as an aid in predicting the duration of your sick leave or not.

regardlessOfChoiceList.title: No matter your choice, it will be the case that
regardlessOfChoiceList.li1: the exact same personal data is used
regardlessOfChoiceList.li2: a case handler makes the final decision
regardlessOfChoiceList.li3: you have the exact same rights regarding your personal data

learnMore.disagreeTitle: If you disagree to the use of the AI model
learnMore.disagreeInfo: If you choose to disagree to the use of the AI model in predicating you sick leave, your case handler will process the data without its use. This might result in longer processing time.
learnMore.disagreeFlowImageAlt: Process when declining the use of the AI model
learnMore.agreeTitle: If you agree to the use of the AI model
learnMore.agreeInfo: If you choose to agree to the use of the AI model in predicating you sick leave, the data will first be processed by the model, and the result of the prediction will be handed to a case handler. The case handler then uses this prediction, along with other factors, to decide what support is appropriate for you in your situation.
learnMore.agreeFlowImageAlt: Process when agreeing to the use of the AI model

howAi.title: How the AI model works
howAi.description1: The AI model is a computational tool that makes a prediction of your total sick leave duration based on its knowledge of previous predictions.
howAi.description2: The output it provides to the case handler is the number of weeks it predicts that your sick leave duration will be, and what data points contributed most to this prediction.

learnMore.title: How the AI model works
learnMore.description: Artificial intelligence is an umbrella term that describes computer systems that can solve complex problems and learn from previous experiences.

machineLearningModelTraitList.title: The type of artificial intelligence we use for prediction is a so called machine learning model, which has the following traits:
machineLearningModelTraitList.li1: It initially learns from a select set of training data that contains patterns or similarities
machineLearningModelTraitList.li2: The patterns are revealed through processing
machineLearningModelTraitList.li3: A model is generated that can recognize these patterns in other data of the same category

learnMore.trainingModelImageAlt: Illustration of how the model is trained
learnMore.descriptionPatternMatching: The model is the resulting pattern matching program, and it is this that is used for prediction. New data of the same category is used as input, meaning the data has the same data points and the same domain (for example estimation of sick leave duration), and the result is the prediction.
learnMore.usingModelImageAlt: Illustration of how the model is used

whyAi.title: Why we offer use of an AI model
whyAi.description1: Our goal is to ensure the most helpful support for the highest number of people.
whyAi.description2: The AI model may help case workers in making more accurate predictions of sick leave duration, and its use may contribute to achieve this aim.

learnMore.title: Why we offer the use of the AI model in predicting sick leave duration

reasonForUseList.title: Our goal is to ensure the most helpful support for the highest number of people. To help our case handlers achieve this aim, we offer the use of an AI model for estimation to:
reasonForUseList.li1: help case handlers make more accurate assessments
reasonForUseList.li2: help in ensuring appropriate support where it is needed
reasonForUseList.li3: save resources and time, letting the case handlers help more people

learnMore.rightToChoose: It is your right to choose whether the case handler should use the AI model for prediction or not.

aboutRightsInfo.title: Your rights as a user
aboutRightsInfo.description1: As a user of this service you have certain rights, especially related to your personal data.
aboutRightsInfo.description2: You can read more about your rights as a user by expanding this box.

readMore.userRightsTitle: As a user you have the right to:
readMore.li1: Get information on which of your personal data is being used and why
readMore.li3: At any time request the removal of your personal data from our system
readMore.li4: Request that the process which is using your data is canceled
readMore.li5: Be presented with your personal information in an understandable way
readMore.li6: At any time protest against processing of your personal data

usingAiPage.consentQuestion: Do you consent to the use of the AI model for predicting your sick leave duration?
usingAiPage.disagreeButtonText: I do not consent to usage of the AI model
usingAiPage.agreeButtonText: I consent to usage of the AI model
